title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the MRU (Most Recently Used) list are not appearing in the File menu.
EB: The files in the MRU list should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Open some files.
3. Close the application.
4. Reopen the application.
5. Verify that the previously opened files are listed in the MRU list under the File menu.
